analysis.description:
DecentralandBuyer.withdraw (/unique_chucks/7/0x4dc868d79611c2bdca51dee62873eb3a31423b47.sol#61-96) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- contract_token_balance == 0

Reentrancy in DecentralandBuyer.withdraw (/unique_chucks/7/0x4dc868d79611c2bdca51dee62873eb3a31423b47.sol#61-96):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/7/0x4dc868d79611c2bdca51dee62873eb3a31423b47.sol#74)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/7/0x4dc868d79611c2bdca51dee62873eb3a31423b47.sol#82-83)
	- contract_eth_value (/unique_chucks/7/0x4dc868d79611c2bdca51dee62873eb3a31423b47.sol#80)

DecentralandBuyer.developer should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x4dc868d79611c2bdca51dee62873eb3a31423b47.sol#38-40)
DecentralandBuyer.earliest_buy_block should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x4dc868d79611c2bdca51dee62873eb3a31423b47.sol#36-38)
DecentralandBuyer.password_hash should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x4dc868d79611c2bdca51dee62873eb3a31423b47.sol#34-35)
DecentralandBuyer.sale should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x4dc868d79611c2bdca51dee62873eb3a31423b47.sol#40-42)
